GapFillDragDrop.Title: Unreal past
GapFillDragDrop.Instruction: Click on a word and drag it to the correct gap.

Content.Question:
1. Well, what if we held your party in the park instead of at home?
2. It’s high time we lost our reputation as good losers.
3. It isn’t much use wishing you were the best, because you aren’t.
4. But suppose we were to give the part to Rufus?
5. I wish I had never set eyes on you!
6. Wouldn’t you rather catch a train instead of hanging around in the airport?
7. I wish she would stop complaining and just get on with her work.
8. I’d sooner you didn’t drop litter all over my front garden.
9. I’m pleased he’s been promoted because - let’s be honest - it’s about time.
10. If only I’d bought shares in that company when I had the chance!
